DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare pharmacokinetic characteristic DP-R206 ( 150mg Ibandronate / 24,000 IU Vitamin D3 complex tablet , qd ) Bonviva ( 150mg Ibandronate , qd ) oral administration healthy adult volunteer .

DOC.detailed_description: The number patient eighty-four . Patients randomly assign either Bonviva tablet ( 150mg Ibandronate , qd ) first , DP-R206 ( 150mg Ibandronate / 24,000 IU Vitamin D3 complex tablet , qd ) Second DP-R206 ( 150mg Ibandronate / 24,000 IU Vitamin D3 complex tablet , qd ) first , Bonviva tablet ( 150mg Ibandronate , qd ) second .
